meanings.definition: Of or relating to the woods or forest.
meanings.sent1: The sylvans creatures enjoyed the cool shade of the trees.
meanings.sent2: The cabin was surrounded by sylvans trees, creating a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The sylvans animals held a secret meeting deep in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The sylvans landscape whispered ancient stories to those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The sylvans setting was like stepping into a magical world.

meanings.definition: A mythical deity or spirit of the woods.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of powerful sylvans protecting the forest.
meanings.sent2: The sylvans of old were said to dance under the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous sylvans played pranks on unsuspecting travelers.
meanings.sent4: The sylvans watched over the forest like silent guardians.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the sylvans filled the woods with an otherworldly energy.

meanings.definition: A person who lives in or frequents the woods.
meanings.sent1: The old hermit was known as the sylvans of the forest.
meanings.sent2: The sylvans knew every hidden path and secret clearing in the woods.
meanings.sent3: The sylvans greeted each sunrise with a sense of peace and gratitude.
meanings.sent4: The sylvans shared their meals with the woodland creatures, forming a unique bond.
meanings.sent5: The sylvans moved through the woods with a grace that seemed almost magical.
